Authors:
Vanessa Maria Pereira, Sirlei Cristina Souza, Silvino I.
Moreira, Sarah da Silva Costa Guimarães, Glaucia Mara Moreira, Wesley O
Mendes, Eduardo Mateus Nery, Eduardo Alves, Sara Maria Chalfoun, Luis
Roberto Batista
Title:
Aspergillus trisporus: A new section Jani species from
Ferriferous Quadrangle soils, Minas Gerais, Brazil
Keywords:
Taxonomy, Multilocus phylogeny, Soil fungi, Ferriferous
Quadrangle
Abstract:
Phenotypic characters and phylogenetic analyses based on
ITS, β-tubulin (BenA) and the second largest subunit of RNA polymerase
II (RPB2) gene sequences were applied to identify Aspergillus trisporus,
a third member of Aspergillus Jani section isolated from soil in
Ferriferous Quadrangle, Brazil.
